CustomField.formula: BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'י') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'כ') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ל') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'מ') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'נ') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ס') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ע') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'פ') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'צ') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ק') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ר') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ש') || BEGINS(Name_Formula__c, 'ת')
CustomField.label: בדיקת אות תחילית י-ת
